Kissimmee Cottage

A 2 bedroom, 2 bath cottage close to Disney World

About our home

5 guests • 2 bedrooms • 3 beds • 2 bathrooms

Experience a peaceful and fully furnished 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom cottage that is well maintained and smoke-free. Located in the heart of Florida's year-round entertainment, this cottage is just 8 miles away from the Disney Parks, 12 miles away from Sea World, and 18 miles away from Universal Studios parking lots.

Take pleasure in using the resort swimming pool and hot tub, as well as participating in a variety of outdoor activities such as miniature golf, pickleball, and shuffleboard.

The cottage is equipped with a fully equiped kitchen with all the necessary items. Additionally, all the linens and towels are provided.
